name: Customer Service Excellence
goal_statement: Master excellent customer service and create positive customer experiences
default_mastery_criteria: 3 consecutive shifts with all required steps Correct
steps: [{"step_order":1,"step_description":"Greet customers warmly within 30 seconds","is_required":true},{"step_order":2,"step_description":"Listen actively to customer needs","is_required":true},{"step_order":3,"step_description":"Suggest appropriate ice cream flavors","is_required":true},{"step_order":4,"step_description":"Handle payment accurately","is_required":true},{"step_order":5,"step_description":"Thank customer and invite them back","is_required":true}]

name: Ice Cream Preparation
goal_statement: Learn to prepare ice cream servings safely and efficiently
default_mastery_criteria: 5 consecutive shifts with all required steps Correct
steps: [{"step_order":1,"step_description":"Wash hands and sanitize work area","is_required":true},{"step_order":2,"step_description":"Select correct ice cream flavor","is_required":true},{"step_order":3,"step_description":"Scoop appropriate portion size","is_required":true},{"step_order":4,"step_description":"Apply toppings as requested","is_required":true},{"step_order":5,"step_description":"Present order attractively","is_required":true},{"step_order":6,"step_description":"Clean equipment after use","is_required":true}]

name: Cash Register Operations
goal_statement: Operate cash register accurately and handle transactions
default_mastery_criteria: 3 consecutive shifts with all required steps Correct
steps: [{"step_order":1,"step_description":"Enter order items correctly","is_required":true},{"step_order":2,"step_description":"Calculate total with tax","is_required":true},{"step_order":3,"step_description":"Process payment method","is_required":true},{"step_order":4,"step_description":"Give correct change","is_required":true},{"step_order":5,"step_description":"Print receipt for customer","is_required":false}]
